front.title: Deployment of inter-operable and cost-effective monitoring infrastructure in ISP networks

abstract.t: This document identifies issues and concerns in monitoring ISP networks. It outlines the components of a monitoring infrastructure designed to support ISP requirements. It discusses deployment and inter-operability issues. Related IETF working groups are identified. The goal of this document is to open a discussion on whether there should be a BOF addressing this issue at the next IETF (Vienna, July 2003).
